question: Which union ministry has inaugurated the International Workshop on Environment Flows at Delhi?
option2: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
option3: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
explanation: Union Minister for Jal Shakti, Gajendra Singh Shekhawat has recently Â inaugurated the International Workshop on Environment Flows at Delhi. He also formally released the first version of the Guidance Document on Environment flow assessment in India. The purpose of the workshop is to assist in the e-flows implementation in India by answering the following questions: What are the overall aims and targets for e-flows assessment in India? & What are the short- and long-term steps to implement e-flows according to the overall aims and targets.
